title: Is technology used by Apple in their products developed by them, or by the manufacturing company? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: Apple designs virtually everything about their products. They develop components to spec and precision as much as possible themselves, but then for mass-scale production they let hardware manufacturers produce them. Wherever possible, Apple will either design it themselves, or collaborate with the manufacturer of that particular component to design it together (so that it works for Apple’s needs). But the physical manufacturing of components is done by other companies.

Apple makes many products and software for them too so if we talk about iOS (formerly iPhone OS) that is a mobile operating system created and developed by Apple Inc. exclusively for its hardware. It is the operating system that presently powers many of the company's mobile devices, including the iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch. It is the second most popular mobile operating system globally after Android.
